name: Western Dress Up And Makeover
description:
Dress up games are trending this days. This games are for girls who love to be creative.

If you fall in same category this is for you after success of Indian Beauty Dressup and Hijab Make Up Salon games here we come again with new variety of wardrobe.

Here we have our friend , she from usa and she has to get ready for her 18th birthday. She want to look like princess and we have to help her to get ready for her occasion.

we have decided there different stages where we will take her to salon get her wax , face massage scrub and pimple treatment to make her face glow.

Once that is done we will give her steam and spa treatment. later we will take her to salon and give her make up including face foundation , mascara , eyebrow and hair style.

Now comes the final stage dress up , we have her wardrobe ready with all the western cloths to choose from.

We have western assessors , western boots, bracelet , earring , neckless.

Hope you will help our princess to makeover and help her ready for her 18th birthday.

We will be coming up with more dress up games.

And would like to here from you, so we can improve our self and can give you best user experience.
